about_the_game:
Feed the Pets Fall Animals — Take care of your pets to make them happy!



This game is a continuation of the Feed the Pets series of games.
In this part, you will find themed autumn pets.
Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of golden autumn with pleasant characters and relaxing music.

Give your care to your pets, because whatever the weather is now outside your window, these little animals are in eternal autumn.



Invest your earned money wisely to earn even more money to feed your pets!



Pump up food delivery! Forest couriers will make sure that each pet receives its order on time!



Hire a manager to take care of your pets during your absence.

Come to the game more often to monitor the work of the manager and regularly open happy chests.

Buy yourself a legal autoclicker so that your hands have time to rest.

Also, pump your clicks to make your pet even more pleasant!
detailed_description:
Feed the Pets Fall Animals — Take care of your pets to make them happy!



This game is a continuation of the Feed the Pets series of games.
In this part, you will find themed autumn pets.
Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of golden autumn with pleasant characters and relaxing music.

Give your care to your pets, because whatever the weather is now outside your window, these little animals are in eternal autumn.



Invest your earned money wisely to earn even more money to feed your pets!



Pump up food delivery! Forest couriers will make sure that each pet receives its order on time!



Hire a manager to take care of your pets during your absence.

Come to the game more often to monitor the work of the manager and regularly open happy chests.

Buy yourself a legal autoclicker so that your hands have time to rest.

Also, pump your clicks to make your pet even more pleasant!
name: Feed the Pets Fall Animals

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel / AMD processor, 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel / AMD processor, 3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Feed the Pets Fall Animals — A cute clicker, where you shall feed the pets, and make them happy! Continuation of the Feed the Pets franchise.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
